title: Stock Futures Edge Lower After Rally
sub_head: The British pound fell after U.K. annual inflation reached a four-decade high
body:
U.S. stock futures crept lower after major stock indexes rallied in the prior session, putting Wall Street on course to extend the yearâ€™s volatility.
Futures for the S&P 500 fell 0.5% Wednesday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 receded 0.7% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged 0.2% lower. Technology shares led a rebound in markets Tuesday.
